text: Anything else you feel like discussing?

If you're joining the family, can you please
be the one person in it who f****** talks to
me? I love her, sir.
And I'll always take care of her.
That's why I said yes.

You know why people don't come and talk to
you?

Cause they're scared they're gonna let you
down.
I know I am. Well.

If you're marrying Beth, you've already
proved you're not scared of anything.
Yeah. That horse needs a home.
Just ain't mine.
Go find him one.
Yes, sir.
I
thought you said you wanted some company.
Huh? What for?

We've been driving for six hours and you
ain't said a f****** word.
Lord, I'm trying to choose my words.

S***. You should have been able to write the
f****** song by now.
You old softie.

Been kicking the s*** out of this bloomer
ever since we left the ranch.

He deserves to have his last ride in style,
Llyod.
It seemed to like living with us, didn't ya?
The feeling is mutual.
Oh, you'd like it better here.
Cause you ain't welcome back.
I'm getting married.

Yeah. I've been wondering what's up with you
lately?
I need a best man.
Cassie's brother fixing to be yours.
Mhm. You should ask him.
Probably so, but I ain't.
I'm asking you.
